suspect.describe: the player's career data is abnormal or the single-game data is seriously inconsistent with his career, and there is a suspicion of opening and hanging. Members of the identification team require the player to prove himself or to give self-proof time after the player has submitted a self-certificate statement. From the status start date to 7 days later, if the self-proof is not successful, it will be automatically transferred to the real hammer.

innocent.describe: cleared the suspect of the reported information by video.

discuss.describe: the above evidence still requires more administrators and players to participate in discussions and decisions, uncertain behavior.

guilt.text: cast a vote for stone hammer
guilt.describe: if the administrator thinks that he is cheating, cast a vote and meet the conditions, the system will confirm the player's status.

invalid.describe: reporting acts such as incomplete information or reporting incorrect ID

more.describe: need to add more strong evidence

error.title: error
error.description: Please send the error to the developer to help solve the problem

name.underLengthError: the input length is not enough, at least 3 characters

checkplayer.idLengthError: id length does not match, please be in the range of minimum 5 to maximum 50
